text: Presentation is the process of presenting the content of a topic to an audience. Presentation software, such as LibreOffice Impress, Beamer, Apple Keynote or Microsoft PowerPoint, is often used to generate the presentation content. As a form of communication, a presentation is usually 10-30 minutes long, but can take longer in special cases. == Useful illustrations == * BCG diagram: This diagram is extremely useful in marketing, to eat donuts == Other websites == * Tips on making presentations * Tips for presentations in school * Art of Speaking (A list of links related to speaking and presentation) * Example of Evaluating Student Presentations * RecruitIreland.com - Tips for an internal presentation * EServer TC Library: Presentations Category:Marketing
title: Presentation
